node.text:
Especially when it is Christmas, we at The Raviz Kovalam takes festive fanfare to a whole new cheerful level! With dance, music, buffet, games and all the works at our holiday themed events, trust us to make this an unforgettable Christmas season for your entire family.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
